#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,n,k;
    unsigned long long seq[23];
    seq[1]=0;
    seq[2]=1;
    for(int i=3; i<=21; i++)
    {
        seq[i]=(i-1)*seq[i-1]+(i-2)*seq[i-2];
        //cout<<seq[i]<<"\n";
    }
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d%d",&k,&n);
        int mod=1;
        unsigned long long temp;
        if(k<10)
            mod=10;
        else if(k<99)
            mod=100;
        else
            mod=1000;
        temp=seq[n];
        int count=0;
        if(temp==0 && k==0)
        {
            printf("1\n");
            continue;
        }
        while(temp)
        {
            if(temp%mod==k)
                count++;
            temp/=10;
        }
        printf("%d\n",count);
    }
}
